A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Oh my gosh. The whole movie was visually stunning but the creators really outdone themselves when it comes to animals. They were simply breathtaking. The landscape of the final battle blew my mind. The red colors were so rich and beautifully making up the landscape. The plot somewhat feels as a repetition or flash back to famous twins but really keeps you guessing until the end and makes you wonder what’s next? With that episode it feels like the past is sort of staying in the past and new adventures will unfold in the far far away galaxy for us to watch again 😉😉😉
